select ssai.id, ssai.spu_id, ssai.sale_attr_id, ssai.sale_attr_name, spsav.id sale_attr_value_id, spsav.spu_sale_attr_id, spsav.spu_sale_attr_value_name, if(sksav.sku_id is null,0,1) is_checked
from spu_sale_attr_info ssai inner join spu_sale_attr_value spsav on ssai.spu_id = spsav.spu_id and ssai.id = spsav.spu_sale_attr_id left join sku_sale_attr_value sksav on sksav.spu_sale_attr_value_id = spsav.id and sksav.sku_id =#{skuId} where ssai.spu_id=#{spuId} order by ssai.sale_attr_id ,spsav.id
